name: Zirconium tetrafluoride
desc: Zirconium(IV) fluoride (ZrF4) is an inorganic chemical compound. It is a component of ZBLAN fluoride glass. It is insoluble in water. It is the main component of fluorozirconate glasses.
Other anions:
Zirconium(IV) chloride
Zirconium(IV) bromide
Zirconium(IV) iodide
standard state:
Except where otherwise noted, data are given for materials in their standard state (at 25 °C [77 °F], 100 kPa).
